author: Sidharth Yadav
title: COVID-19 | Indore records 17 cases in a day
description: Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan tells people to stay indoors
content:
As many as 17 positive cases of COVID-19 were on March 31 reported in Indore, the most populous city in Madhya Pradesh. 
Coronavirus has infected 44 persons in Indore alone, of the 65 cases in the State. In addition, three persons from the city have succumbe… [+1448 chars]
